description: This file contains functions related to reasoning using the Groq model, including methods to determine if a model is a Groq reasoning model and to obtain reasoning messages asynchronously or synchronously, with content extraction between <think> tags.

methods.name: is_groq_reasoning_model
methods.description: Checks if the given reasoning model is a Groq model associated with deepseek based on class name and id.

methods.name: get_groq_reasoning
methods.description: Synchronously retrieves reasoning content from a reasoning agent, extracting content between <think> tags if present, and returns a Message object.

methods.name: agroq_reasoning
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves reasoning content from a reasoning agent, extracting content between <think> tags if present, and returns a Message object.
